mixed-citation.article-title: Atlas of European millipedes 3: Order Chordeumatida (Class Diplopoda)

tp:treatment-sec.p:
The systematic position of this genus is unclear. Originally described in
Anthogonidae ( Mauriès & Vicente 1977 )
, it was listed in Vandeleumatidae by Spelda (2015) . We provisionally keep it in this family although Mauriès (2014) did not include it in this list of vandeleumatid genera.
